about_the_game:
Gear up with the Mega Man 11 Original Soundtrack, featuring the high-octane music of the full game soundtrack, plus special arrangements of each Robot Master's stage!

The 105+ minute soundtrack has been re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
detailed_description:
Gear up with the Mega Man 11 Original Soundtrack, featuring the high-octane music of the full game soundtrack, plus special arrangements of each Robot Master's stage!

The 105+ minute soundtrack has been re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
name: Mega Man 11 Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 845 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 932 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 (V0) + AAC (VBR) / FLAC (16-bit)

short_description: Gear up with the Mega Man 11 Original Soundtrack, featuring the high-octane music of the full game soundtrack, plus special arrangements of each Robot Master's stage!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
